title: System Design Practical Competency Enhancement: Instruction through Error Diagnosis in Predictive Learning Analytics (PLA) Models

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental learning analytics concepts and intermediate-level social science knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can identify and classify False Negative (FN) and False Positive (FP) error types in the PLA model through real-world case studies
Learners can analytically explain at least three unexpected life/work change factors influencing error occurrence
Learners can propose new data sources (e.g., financial aid information, prior knowledge assessments) that can be integrated to improve learning design
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
